about.title: Perfect solution for advertising
about.text: Adleria is a new web solution for advertising on indoors andoutdoors digital screens, the so called digital signage screens. Adleria aggregates, classifies and rates all the screens on an area and allowsyou to create campaigns on them. It is easy to find the relevant screens that are where your target group is. You can also filter by rating, onlydisplaying ads on those screens that meets the standards that yourpublicity requires.
